Option.Name: Cool
Option.Description: Phydolons begin the game with one rank in Cool or Discipline. They still may not train Cool or Discipline above rank 2 during character creation.

Option.Name: Discipline
Option.Description: Phydolons begin the game with one rank in Cool or Discipline. They still may not train Cool or Discipline above rank 2 during character creation.

Option.Name: Symbiotic Resilience
Option.Description: When recovering wounds naturally, Phydolons heal 1 extra wound per full night's rest. In addition, a Phydolon may attempt to recover naturally from one Critical Injury after a full night's rest, instead of after a full week. (See page 226 of the F ORCE AND DESTINY Core Rulebook).

Option.Name: Symbiont Isolation
Option.Description: If no other Phydolons are present when a Phydolon recovers strain at the end of an encounter, they recover 1 less strain to a minimum of 1.
